channel.title: *@*@* I Can't Run Any Clients On My Laptop?! *@*@*
channel.description:
Hey all!
I have just went and bought a new laptop last week and I just have been tyring to download a server to play on. I can download it and all just fine, but when I go to click on Run.bat, the black CMD box pops up for like 0.03 secs! I can't see what it says and I don't have time to take a screenshot or nothing. So if anyone has any ideas on how to resolve this, that would be great!
[b]Also:[/b] I have a desktop computer too in my room and I can download and play servers on that so I don't know what is so different about my laptop not being able to run anything.
[b]Extra Info (In-Case):[/b] 1.25 GB of RAM - Windows Vista Ultimate.
Thanks in advance!
- Ags4Lyfe
